atk-abh03a20:2_9: Evaṁ catubbidhe vimuttiñāṇe nippariyāyena phalañāṇameva vimutti.
atk-abh03a20:2_11: Tasmā “idaṁ nāma vimuttiñāṇaṁ vimutta”nti avatvā aviseseneva “vimuttiñāṇaṁ vimutta”nti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a20:2_15: Puna yaṁkiñcīti puṭṭho paccavekkhaṇādīni sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a20:2_16: Paṭipannassāti puṭṭho maggañāṇassa anāsavataṁ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a20:2_17: Yasmā pana taṁ sotāpannassa phale ṭhitassa ñāṇaṁ na hoti,
atk-abh03a20:2_18: tasmā vimuttaṁ nāma na hotīti codanatthaṁ puna sakavādī sotāpannassātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a20:5_2: Tattha yasmā ānandattherādayo sekhā “uḷāro bhagavā”tiādinā nayena asekhe jānanti,
atk-abh03a20:5_7: Jānāti passatīti idaṁ attanā adhigatassa jānanavasena vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a20:5_8: Gotrabhunotiādi heṭṭhimāya bhūmiyaṁ ṭhitassa uparūpariñāṇassa abhāvadassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a20:5_9: Nanu āyasmā ānando sekho “uḷāro bhagavā”ti jānātīti paravādī asekhe bhagavati pavattattā taṁ asekhañāṇanti icchati,
atk-abh03a20:5_11: Tasmā evaṁ patiṭṭhāpitāpi laddhi appatiṭṭhāpitāva hotīti.
atk-abh03a20:8_3: tassa taṁ ñāṇaṁ viparītañāṇa”nti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a20:8_10: Tato sakavādī “lakkhaṇapathavīpi sasambhārapathavīpi nimittapathavīpi pathavīdevatāpi sabbā pathavīyeva,
atk-abh03a20:8_11: tāsu pathavīti ñāṇaṁ viparītaṁ na hoti.
atk-abh03a20:8_13: Kiṁ te idaṁ etesu aññatara”nti codetuṁ anicce niccantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a20:9_3: Sabbeva pathavīti sabbaṁ taṁ pathavīkasiṇaṁ lakkhaṇapathavīyeva hotīti pucchati.
atk-abh03a20:9_6: atthi ca koci pathaviṁ pathavito samāpajjatīti pucchā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a20:9_9: atthi ca koci taṁ pathaviṁ pathavitoyeva samāpajjati,
atk-abh03a20:9_12: taṁ tathā samāpajjantassa ñāṇaṁ viparītaṁ hoti,
atk-abh03a20:9_14: tampi samāpajjantassa sabbavipariyesasamugghātanaṁ maggañāṇampi te viparītaṁ hotū”ti dassanatthaṁ vuttanti.
atk-abh03a20:12_3: taṁ “bhabbo esa dhammaṁ abhisametu”nti yasmā bhagavā jānāti,
atk-abh03a20:12_4: tasmā “aniyatassa puthujjanasseva sato puggalassa niyāmagamanāya ñāṇaṁ atthī”ti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a20:12_9: Yaṁ panassa ñāṇaṁ disvā bhagavā “bhabbo aya”nti jānāti,
atk-abh03a20:13_0: Athassa sakavādī ayuttavāditaṁ dīpetuṁ niyatassāti viparītānuyogamāha.
atk-abh03a20:13_1: Tattha paṭhamapañhe maggena niyatassa aniyāmagamanāya ñāṇaṁ nāma natthīti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a20:13_3: Tatiye aniyatassa natthīti puṭṭhattā laddhivirodhena paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a20:13_4: Puna paṭhamapañhameva catutthaṁ katvā niyatassa niyāmagamanādivasena tayo pañhā katā.
atk-abh03a20:13_5: Tesu paṭhame yasmā ādimaggena niyatassa puna tadatthāya ñāṇaṁ natthi,
atk-abh03a20:13_9: Puna paṭhamapañhaṁ aṭṭhamaṁ katvā aniyatassa aniyāmagamanādivasena tayo pañhā katā.
atk-abh03a20:13_11: Puna paṭhamapañhameva dvādasamaṁ katvā taṁmūlakā atthi niyāmotiādayo pañhā katā.
atk-abh03a20:13_12: Tattha yasmā niyāmagamanāya ñāṇaṁ nāma maggañāṇameva hoti,
atk-abh03a20:13_13: tasmā taṁ sandhāya atthi niyāmoti vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a20:13_22: Tasmā iminā kāraṇena patiṭṭhitāpissa laddhi appatiṭṭhitāyevāti.
atk-abh03a20:16_3: sabbaṁ lokuttaramevā”ti gahetvā “sabbaṁ ñāṇaṁ paṭisambhidā”ti laddhi,
atk-abh03a20:16_9: Ye keci sammutinti pañhe puthujjane sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a20:16_15: kiṁ sabbā sā paṭisambhidā”ti pucchanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a20:16_16: Tenahi sabbaṁ ñāṇanti yasmā sabbā lokuttarapaññā paṭisambhidā,
atk-abh03a20:16_17: tasmā sabbanti vacanaṁ sāmaññaphalena saddhiṁ patiṭṭhāpetīti.
atk-abh03a20:19_3: Ye pana evaṁ vibhāgaṁ akatvā saccanti vacanasāmaññena sammutiñāṇampi “saccārammaṇamevā”ti vadanti,
atk-abh03a20:19_5: te ayuttavādinoti tesaṁ vādavisodhanatthaṁ ayaṁ kathā āraddhā.
atk-abh03a20:19_14: tena ñāṇena dukkhapariññādīni kareyyā”ti codetuṁ tena ñāṇenātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a20:22_2: Tattha cetopariyāye ñāṇanti vacanamattameva gahetvā “taṁ ñāṇaṁ cittārammaṇamevā”ti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a20:22_8: tasmā na vattabbaṁ taṁ cittārammaṇaññevā”ti codanatthaṁ nanu atthi kocītiādi āraddhaṁ.
atk-abh03a20:22_11: Puna phassārammaṇe ñāṇaṁ na vattabbanti puṭṭho phassassa phusanalakkhaṇaṁ manasikaroto phassovārammaṇaṁ hotīti paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a20:22_12: Kiṁ panetaṁ phassapariyāye ñāṇanti puṭṭho pana tādisassa suttapadassa abhāvā paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a20:22_15: tadeva dassetvā laddhiṁ patiṭṭhāpetuṁ nanu cetopariyāye ñāṇantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a20:22_16: Sā panesā vacanamattābhinivesena patiṭṭhāpitāpi appatiṭṭhāpitāva hotīti.
atk-abh03a20:25_7: Tattha ye sabbasmimpi anāgate ñāṇaṁ icchanti,
atk-abh03a20:25_12: kiṁ tena anantaraṁ anāgataṁ mūlādivasena jānātī”ti codetuṁ anāgataṁ mūlatotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a20:25_16: Tato ca taṁ hinoti pavattayatīti hetu.
atk-abh03a20:25_27: Yasmā pana anantaraṁ cittaṁ etehākārehi na sakkā jānituṁ,
atk-abh03a20:25_29: Anāgataṁ hetupaccayatanti yā anantarānāgate citte hetupaccayatā,
atk-abh03a20:25_34: Gotrabhunotiādi yasmiṁ anāgate ñāṇaṁ na uppajjati,
atk-abh03a20:25_36: Pāṭaliputtassāti suttaṁ yasmiṁ anāgate ñāṇaṁ uppajjati,
atk-abh03a20:25_38: Yasmā panetaṁ na sabbasmiṁ anāgate ñāṇassa sādhakaṁ;
atk-abh03a20:28_2: Tattha yesaṁ “sabbasaṅkhāresu aniccato diṭṭhesu tampi ñāṇaṁ aniccato diṭṭhaṁ hotī”ti vacanaṁ nissāya
atk-abh03a20:28_7: Atha naṁ “yadi avisesena paṭuppanne ñāṇaṁ atthi,
atk-abh03a20:28_9: Evaṁ sante dvinnaṁ ñāṇānaṁ ekato abhāvā teneva ñāṇena taṁ jānitabbaṁ hotī”ti codanatthaṁ tenāti anuyogo sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a20:28_10: Tattha paṭhamapañhe teneva taṁ jānituṁ na sakkāti paṭikkhepo itarassa.
atk-abh03a20:28_12: Paṭipāṭito bhaṅgaṁ passanto bhaṅgānupassaneneva bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇaṁ passatīti adhippāyo.
atk-abh03a20:28_13: Tena ñāṇena taṁ ñāṇaṁ jānātītiādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a20:28_14: Tena phassena taṁ phassantiādīnissa lesokāsanivāraṇatthaṁ vuttāni.
atk-abh03a20:28_15: Yaṁ panetena laddhipatiṭṭhāpanatthaṁ nanu sabbasaṅkhāretiādi vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a20:28_16: Tattha nayato taṁ ñāṇaṁ diṭṭhaṁ hoti,
atk-abh03a20:28_18: Tasmā evaṁ patiṭṭhitāpissa laddhi appatiṭṭhitāva hoti.
atk-abh03a20:31_2: Tattha “buddhāpi sattānaṁ ariyaphalappattiyā dhammaṁ desenti sāvakāpi,
atk-abh03a20:31_3: iti iminā sāmaññena buddhānaṁ viya sāvakānampi tena tena sattena pattabbe phale ñāṇaṁ atthī”ti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a20:31_7: Atha naṁ “yadi sāvakassa phale ñāṇaṁ atthi,
atk-abh03a20:31_8: yathā buddhā samānepi sotāpattiphale attano ñāṇabalena ‘ayaṁ ekabījī,
atk-abh03a20:31_11: kiṁ te evaṁ sāvakopī”ti codetuṁ sāvako phalassa kataṁ paññapetīti āha.
atk-abh03a20:32_0: Atthi sāvakassa phalaparopariyattītiādi phale ñāṇassa atthitāya paccayapucchanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a20:32_3: idaṁ opara”nti evaṁ phalānaṁ uccāvacabhāvajānanasaṅkhātā phale paropariyatti nāma atthi.
atk-abh03a20:32_5: tāsaṁ atthitāya tassa tassa puggalassa tesaṁ tesaṁ indriyānaṁ vasena taṁ taṁ phalaṁ jānanti,
atk-abh03a20:32_6: kiṁ te sāvakassāpi etā paropariyattiyo atthīti.
atk-abh03a20:33_0: Atthi sāvakassa khandhapaññattītiādīnipi “yadi te sāvakassa buddhānaṁ viya phale ñāṇaṁ atthi,
atk-abh03a20:33_3: sakkoti so etā paññattiyo attano balena jānituṁ vā paññapetuṁ vā”ti codanatthaṁ vuttāni.
atk-abh03a20:33_4: Sāvako jinotiādi “yadi sāvakassa buddhānaṁ viya phale ñāṇaṁ atthi,
atk-abh03a20:33_5: evaṁ sante sveva jino”ti codanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a20:33_7: Aññāṇīti pañhe avijjāsaṅkhātassa aññāṇassa vihatattā paṭikkhitto,
atk-abh03a20:33_8: na panassa buddhānaṁ viya phale ñāṇaṁ atthi.
